Name: Just Drift It !
About the game: 'Just Drift It !' is a cool little game with custom vehicle physics based on realistic tire model and advanced suspension ! 'Just Drift It !' is all about mastering controls and getting better trying to beat you best score and get higher in the leaderboards ! So have fun and... 'Just Drift It' ! Features: * 12 vehicles * Ghost system * Replay system * Paint car parts * Local audio player * Custom Vehicle Physics * Tuning parameters for suspension, Gearbox, Wheel alignment ( camber angle ) and others... * Freeroam mode * Career mode * Leaderborads * Controller support
